title: About
text: To conduct cutting-edge research in microbiology that contributes to the prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of infectious diseases. We aim to foster excellence in research and education while promoting collaboration with national and international institutions.

title: About
text:
**Bacterial Pathogenesis** Investigating mechanisms of bacterial infection and host–pathogen interactions
**Antimicrobial Resistance** Studying the emergence and spread of antibiotic-resistant bacteria and developing strategies to combat resistance
**Viral Infections** Researching viral diseases prevalent in Indonesia and Southeast Asia, including emerging infectious diseases
**Mycology** Exploring fungal pathogens and their clinical significance
**Molecular Microbiology** Utilizing molecular techniques to understand microbial genetics and evolution
**Clinical Microbiology** Improving diagnostic methods and developing evidence-based treatment protocols

title: About
text: Our research group consists of dedicated faculty members, postdoctoral researchers, graduate students, and laboratory technicians. Each member brings unique expertise and contributes to our collaborative research environment.

title: About
text:
Biosafety Level 2 (BSL‑2) laboratories
Molecular biology facilities for PCR, sequencing, and genetic analysis
Cell culture facilities
Advanced microscopy equipment
Automated microbiology systems for clinical diagnostics

title: About
text: We collaborate with national and international research centers, hospitals, and universities to contribute to multicenter studies and global health initiatives.

title: About
text:
Supervision of undergraduate and graduate research projects
Workshops and training programs in microbiological techniques
Participation in national and international conferences
Mentorship programs for young researchers

title: About
text:
Contact Us
For more information about our research activities, collaboration opportunities, or educational programs, please contact us through the Faculty of Medicine, Universitas Indonesia.

title: Clinical Microbiology Research Group
text:
The Microbiology Research Group at the Faculty of Medicine, Universitas Indonesia (FKUI) is dedicated to advancing knowledge in the field of microbiology through innovative research and education. Our team comprises experienced researchers, clinicians, and students who are passionate about understanding microbial life and its impact on human health.

title: About
text:
## Our Team
Our research group consists of dedicated faculty members, postdoctoral researchers, graduate students, and laboratory technicians.



Biosafety Level 2 (BSL‑2) laboratories
Molecular biology facilities for PCR, sequencing, and genetic analysis
Cell culture facilities
Advanced microscopy equipment
Automated microbiology systems for clinical diagnostics




We collaborate with national and international research centers, hospitals, and universities to contribute to multicenter studies and global health initiatives.




Supervision of undergraduate and graduate research projects
Workshops and training programs in microbiological techniques
Participation in national and international conferences
Mentorship programs for young researchers

text:
